postReview.title: Brentford 1-1 West Ham: Soucek goal earns point for Lopetegui's men
postReview.description: Brentford and West Ham shared the spoils at the Gtech Community Stadium in a 1-1 draw, with Tomas Soucek cancelling out an early Bees goal.

preReview.title: Lopetegui calling for consistency after EFL Cup humiliation
preReview.description: Julen Lopetegui has endured a tough start to his West Ham reign, but will be hoping to return to winning ways against Brentford on Saturday.
